auth.name: Authentication
auth.description: JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens, user management, and PostgreSQL/SQLite support
auth.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry

users.name: User Management
users.description: CRUD endpoints for user management with role-based access control
users.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry
users.notes: IMPORTANT: This module has mock authentication. To use with auth module, modify users/dependencies.py to import from app.modules.auth.dependencies. See users/dependencies.py and users/models.py for integration instructions.
